title: Expert Training Program for Sustainable Oil Palm Cultivation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic agricultural ecosystems or intermediate expertise in related fields
context.additional_context: Sustainable land-use strategy education based on Indonesian case studies

learning_goals: Learners can scientifically analyze environmental and social impacts of oil palm cultivation
Learners can apply sustainable oil palm cultivation strategies to real-world case studies
Learners can propose environment-economy balance solutions through interdisciplinary research

resources: Scientific research reports and case database

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
